feed.title: This thread is not about the soft/hard fork technical debate

entry.title: This thread is not about the soft/hard fork technical debate
entry.summary: The governance model and design objectives of each implementation of Bitcoin could differ and may use techniques such as BIP101's 750/1000 signalling mechanism to activate changes that may be desirable to the community. It is important to note that this suggestion has been made before and received pushback in the past, as seen in a discussion thread from three months ago on the bitcoin-dev mailing list.
